module: Module-level comment: The ex7_top module generates 7-segment display values using a linear feedback shift register (lfsr_7) and two hexadecimal-to-7-segment decoders (hex_to_7seg). The lfsr_7 register shifts based on the input clock and an 'enable' signal derived from the inverted KEY[3] input. The lfsr_7 output, 'sreg_out', is then divided and fed into two 'hex_to_7seg' modules to generate the display outputs (HEX0, HEX1).
